title: GBoard on Pixel 4 not capitalizing the 'i' in the middle of a sentence
content:
So to describe my issue: Anytime I type the letter 'i' in the middle of a sentence, it does not capitalize anymore like it used to.

I've seen this issue posted elsewhere before, but nothing I tried solved it

Here's a list of things I've tried.
Reset the phone
Uninstall and reinstall updates
Remove entire personal dictionary
Set the shortcut of 'I' to be 'i'
I only have English (US) but I switched to another English, then deleted English (US) and then added it back and deleted the other one
Drag and dropped the small 'i' to "Remove from suggestions" which didn't work
Text correction is on
Spell check is on
Literally everything on every Reddit thread with this issue
Tried joining the Beta to see if that would help the issue (it didn't)
Updated the Pixel 4 XL to the latest software updates

For real, I'm stumped.
